items.q: How many wish lists can I have?
items.a: There is no limit to the number of wish lists you can create or the number of items they can contain.

items.q: Can I hide items on my wish list?
items.a: Yes, but you first need to set an access code for the wish list. After that, selected items can be hidden and will only be visible after entering the access code.

items.q: Do access codes have to be the same?
items.a: Each wish list can have its own access code. However, the access code always applies to all hidden items on that list.

items.q: I canâ€™t hide an item on my wish list.
items.a: To hide an item, an access code must be set first.

items.q: Does the access code hide the entire wish list?
items.a: No. The access code only hides selected items. All other items remain visible.
Your wish list can be accessed via its unique URL, and anyone who has this link can view the wish list.

items.q: How can I change the unique URL of my wish list?
items.a: At the moment, the only option is to create a new wish list, as the URL contains a unique identifier.

items.q: I deleted a wish list or an item. Can I restore it?
items.a: Restoring deleted wish lists or items is not currently available.

items.q: What is the purpose of item priority on a wish list?
items.a: The priority is for informational purposes only. It does not affect how the wish list works.

items.q: Can I sort items or change their order?
items.a: Items are displayed in the order they were added, and it is not currently possible to change this.
